articles.title: Tata Power Takes Over Power Distribution In Western, Southern Odisha - OdishaTV
articles.description: Tata Power on Thursday announced that it has taken over the management and operations of Odisha's power distribution utilities WESCO and SOUTHCO upon completion of the sale process.

articles.title: India’s GDP to contract 7.7% in current fiscal, advance estimates show - The Indian Express
articles.description: Out of a total eight sectors, agriculture and electricity generation are the only two that are projected to be in positive territory, with an estimated growth rate of 3.4 per cent and 2.7 per cent respectively.
